title: A Final Tourney

replies.body:
The officials have talked about a last tournament, we even had a few things figured out but the owners aren't too enthusiastic about the idea :/

That means that we won't be able to use official servers (we'll have to resort to using scrim servers), among other issues which will most probably occur (such as the servers going down/freezing, which has been happening lately).

There are basically too many factors which will make a last tournament a bad experience, for event staff and for players, so we resorted to not hosting one.
